reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck shirt comfortable, soft, and like its color, with one noting it's not too tight around the neck.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and good quality.
items.body: Comfortable and good material. Not too tight around the neck. Read more
items.author: Atangfullife

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will purchase again
items.body: I have this in two colors and will be buying more. So soft and fit nice. Material is not thick or very warm but very comfortable and easy to layer with Read more
items.author: Chelsea Weatherspoon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size Up
items.body: Just received this tonight in a medium, gorgeous color and fabric, comfortable, nice length to cover but short enough to tuck without lots of bulk, very nice mock turtle neck, Will keep me warm but no hot flashes. I had to send back and order a large as this fit but i almost felt like a ‘loose’ women it was that snug. Update: I typically wear small or medium. Sent medium back and ordered large. I was sent a 2xl according to collar label. , it’s still snug across bust but I chose to keep because fabric and color are sensational, I will just need to wear partially buttoned jacket or sweater if I feel too ‘revealing’ that day. This is a gorgeous turtle neck,,,but size up ALOT!!! Read more
items.author: plainjane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Size was just right. Fits well. Not loose at all yet not too tight. Bought these to wear under my work shirts. Kept me warm. Read more
items.author: Sylvanna Romaker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice. Use Size Chart to Size correctly.
items.body: Use the Size Chart!!! i usually wear a Med but i used the Size Chart and ordeted a Large, and it fit perfect. Very nice. Read more
items.author: Pamela Ve

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute look but not cute quality
items.body: This shirt is totally see through and runs small. I’m always a size small in tops and this is very tight. Read more
items.author: Maddie Grace Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great
items.body: Looks great, fits perfectly Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Turtleneck!!!
items.body: Love this turtleneck, you won't be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Lynda Thomas

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Khaki, White, Dusty Pink, Black, Caramel, Coffee, Darkgrey, Navy Blue, Green, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
